venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
Our overnight to Lincoln NH to Alpine Adventures for a zipline tour.

Cost is $89 per person for the skyrider zipline tour BUT THERE IS A 10% discount for the group.

http://www.alpinezipline.com/adventure-tours/zipline-canopy-tour/

Zipline is scheduled for 2 pm on Saturday so expect an early start in the AM.

Accomodations:

Profile Motel and Cottages:

There is a 5 bedroom cottage booked that sleeps 10 people at a cost of $350 for the night.  The first 10 who RSVP will be able to have a bed in the cottage and share the cost.  It has 2 king, 1 queen and 4 twin beds and a full kitchen as well as living rooms.  We can cook dinner in (spagetti night maybe?????)

There are also other motel rooms available at $59 and $69 as well as private cottages with a queen size bed for $59.  If you prefer to book your own room and not stay in the cottage please let Cindy know by indicating it on your comments when you RSVP

http://www.profilemotel.com/

CANCELLATION POLICY

Please note:  If you cancel at the last minute you are still responsible for the cost of your room and zip line reservation.

If you have a private room in the motel you may be able to cancel with a weeks notice.  Zip line reservations are a 72 hour cancellation notice and they withhold $10 from your refund  

THIS IS A RAIN OR SHINE EVENT.  WE WILL GO BY CAR IF THE WEATHER IS NOT COOPERATING AS THE ZIPLINE TOURS ARE ONLY CANCELLED IN EXTREME WEATHER CONDITIONS

Meeting details to follow

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Zippity Do Dah
